availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ashland, Boyd County, Kentucky, laborer. Massachusetts native. Married to Martha Barter Merrill in Carter County, Kentucky, on February 2, 1852. Father of Margaret Merrill, Leander Merrill, Benjamin Merrill, and Elvira Merrill. Resident in Boston, Massachusetts in 1850. Laborer in Ashland in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Massachusetts, Suffolk County, Boston Ward 6, p. 355B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Ashland, p. 838.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Carter County Marriages, Film #001759301, p. 2-3.
Find A Grave, "Name (Birth-Death)," Memorial #37836660, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/37836660 (accessed January 23, 2020).
